name: Dauntless
description: While you defend, if you are stressed, roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Steady Leadership
description: While you coordinate, if you chose a ship with exactly 1 stress token, it can perform actions.

name: Formation Expert
description: After you perform a {focus} action, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship at range 1-2.

name: Suppressive Fire
description:
After you perform an attack, assign the Suppressive Fire condition to the defender. This ship now targets you unless it is fleeing or has Strike AI.
Remove Suppressive Fire after you defend, or at the end of the Combat Phase if you did not perform an attack.

name: Daring Fly By
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, each enemy ship at range 0 gains 2 jam tokens.

name: Defensive Formation
description: While you defend, if there is at least 1 other friendly ship at range 0-1, you may roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Readiness
description: Before you activate, if you are focused, you may perform an action.

name: Elusive Spin
description: While defending, you may gain 1 strain token to change up to 2 of your blank results to {focus} results.

name: Lure Them In
description: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, if it is at range 0, you may perform an action.

name: Hardened
description: While you defend, {crit} results are neutralized before {hit} results.

name: Knife Fighter
description: If you would fail a {boost} action by overlapping another ship, you may resolve it as though you were partially executing a maneuver instead. While you perform an attack at attack range 0, treat it as an attack at attack range 1.

name: Close Call
description: While defending, you may gain a strain token to change 1 {focus} result to an {evade} result.

name: Draw their Fire
description: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 {hit} or {crit} damage to cancel 1 matching result. If you do, gain 1 {xp}.

name: Follow their Lead
description: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, treat your initiative as equal to the chosen ship's initiative until the end of the Engagement Phase.

name: Rallying Cry
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. If you do, that ship removes 1 stress token.

name: Synchronized Strike
description: While you perform an attack at range 1, if the speed of your revealed maneuver matches that of a friendly ship at range 1, you may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Targeting Expert
description: After you acquire or spend a lock, you may remove 1 red token from yourself.

name: Relentless Pursuit
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, you may acquire a lock on an enemy ship in your {af} at range 1.

name: Insight
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends or performs an attack, it may spend your focus tokens as if that ship has them.

name: Protector
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 focus token to choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, that ship rolls 1 additional defense die while defending until the end of the round.

name: Cool Headed
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you are stressed, you may roll 1 attack die. On a {hit} or {crit} result, remove 1 stress token.

name: Stay On Target
description: After you gain a stress token, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Inspire
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens to a friendly ship in your firing arc.

name: Cyborg Enhancements
description:
Adds: {calculate}
After you defend or perform an attack, if you spent a calculate token, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Engagement Analytics
description:
Adds: {calculate}
At the end of the Engagement Phase, you may spend a calculate token to acquire a lock on an enemy ship at range 2-3.

name: Quick Reflexes
description: After you perform a {barrel} or {boost} action, you may perform a red {evade} action.

name: Watchdog
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 becomes the defender, you may spend 1 reinforce token. If you do, that ship gains 1 evade token.

name: Defensive Instincts
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, the attacker cannot reroll more than 1 attack die.

name: Slingshot Maneuver
description: After you barrel roll, you may choose 1 friendly ship that is not stressed at range 0-1. That ship gains 1 stress token, then you rotate 180°.

name: Dogfighter
description: After you fully execute a white maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, it may perform a {focus} action.

name: Uncanny Reflexes
description: Before you activate, you may perform a {barrel} or {boost} action.

name: Daring Faceoff
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the enemy ship's {af}, you may change 1 of your results to an {evade} or {hit} result.

name: Evasive Maneuvers
description: While you defend, if the attacker modified any attack dice, you may roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Sensor Expert
description: Friendly ships can acquire locks onto objects at range 0-3 of any friendly ship.

name: Avenger
description: After another friendly ship defends, if you are not depleted, you may perform a bonus primary attack against the attacker. If you do, after performing that attack, gain 1 deplete token.

name: Nerves of Steel
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are stressed, you may reroll up to 2 of your dice.

name: Bloodbrother
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if a friendly ship with the Bloodsister Ability at range 0-2 is stressed, you may gain a focus token.

name: Gear Head
description: Before you would be dealt a faceup damage card, you may spend 1 {charge} to be dealt the card facedown instead.

name: Call the Shot
description: After you perform the {lock} action, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship may acquire a lock on the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.

name: Synchronized Attack
description: After you spend a lock during an attack, choose a friendly ship at range 1-3. The chosen ship may acquire a lock on the defender.

name: Guidance
description: After you spend a focus token, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1-3. That ship gains 1 focus token.

name: Weak Spot
description: While a friendly ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your {af}, the attacker may change 1 {hit} result to a {crit} result.

name: Regroup
description: During the System Phasse, if there are no enemy ships at range 1-2, you may recover 1 {charge} on any upgrade.

name: Overhwelm
description: While you perform an attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender.

name: Wingman
description: After you perform a {barrel} or {boost} action, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship may perform a {focus} action.

name: Reckless Maneuver
description: After you receive a stress token, you may roll 1 attack die to remove it. On a {hit} result, suffer 1 {hit} damage.

name: Esprit De Corps
description: After you spend a green token, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-3 and gain a strain token. If you do, that ship may perform a red {focus} or red {evade} action.

name: T-65 Expert
description: After you perform a {barrel} or {boost} action, you may flip your equipped {configuration} upgrade card.

name: Pack Tactics
description: While you perform a primary attack, if there is at least 1 other friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Jury-Rigger
description: While you perform a primary attack, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or, if you are not shielded, you may roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

name: Barrage
description: While you perform a {at} attack, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

name: Spotter
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc. If you do, it engages at initiative 7 instead of its standard initiative value this phase.

name: Never Surrender
description: While a damaged friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack, it may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Laser Focus
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, you may spend 1 lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 {focus} result to your dice results.

name: Battle Focus
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 stress token to change all of your {focus} results to {evade} or {hit} results.

name: Hunter
description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your {af}, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die. May not be combined with Sharpshooter or Attack Pattern Delta.

name: Under Pressure
description: While you perform a primary attack, if you are damaged, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Snap Tactics
description: After you perform an attack, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. That ship may perform an action, treating it as red.

name: Double Tap
description: At initiative 0, you may perform a bonus primary attack against an enemy ship in your {ab}. If you do, at the start of the next Planning Phase, gain 1 disarm token.

name: Lock and Load
description: After you declare the defender of an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, a friendly ship may transfer their lock token from you to the defender.

name: Rock Jockey
description: While you move, you ignore obstacles.

name: Into the Breach
description: During the Engagement Phase, you ignore the effects of obstacles that you are overlapping.

name: Reckless Flight Pattern
description: After you gain a red token as a result of moving through or overlapping an obstacle, you may transfer that red token to a friendly ship at range 0-1.

name: Run And Gun
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you must transfer 1 of your stress tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-2.

name: Bloodsister
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if a friendly ship with the Bloodbrother Ability at range 0-2 is stressed, you may acquire a lock.

name: On the Fly
description: After you reveal a red or blue maneuver, you may set your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.

name: Encourage
description: While a friendly ship in your firing arc performs a primary attack, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship may roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Voice of Authority
description: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-3. That ship may perform an action.

name: Clutch Maneuvering
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, choose an initiative value from 1 to 6. You activate at that initiative this phase.

name: Slippery
description: While you defend, if there is an enemy ship at range 0-1, add 1 {evade} result to your dice results.

name: Pot Shot
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 {focus}, {hit}, or {crit} result to look at the defender's facedown damage cards, choose 1, and expose it.

name: Flyboy
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may perform actions, even while stressed.

name: Rapid Reload
description: While you are disarmed, you can still perform {missile} attacks. When you perform a {missile} attack while disarmed, roll a maximum of 4 dice.

name: Attack Pattern Delta
description: While you perform a primary attack, if there is another friendly ship in the defender's firing arc, the defender rolls 1 less defense dice.  May not be combined with Hunter or Sharpshooter.

name: Shock and Awe
description: After you perform an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} to assign the defender 1 jam token. After you defend, you may spend 1 {charge} to assign the attacker 1 jam token.

name: Full Tilt
description: While you perform a primary attack, you may gain a strain token to reroll 1 of your blank results.

name: Fear Tactics
description: Before a friendly ship at range 1-2 engages, if there is an enemy ship in its {af} at range 1, that friendly ship may remove 1 non-lock red token.

name: Scare Tactics
description: Before an enemy ship in your firing arc engages, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token. If you do, that ship cannot spend tokens to modify dice while it performs an attack during this phase.

name: Scoundrel's Luck
description: After you roll dice, if you are at range 0-1 of an obstacle, you may reroll all of your dice. This does not count as rerolling for the purpose of other effects.

name: Veteran Commander
description: Once per round, while another friendly ship at range 1-2 defends or performs an attack, during a Modify Dice step, you may transfer 1 of your focus tokens, evade tokens, or locks to that ship.

name: Sharpshooter
description: While you perform an attack, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die. May not be combined with Hunter or Attack Pattern Delta.

name: Deadeye
description: After you perform an attack that hits, gain 1 focus token.

name: Master of the Dance
description: While you defend, if you are focused, roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Headhunter
description: While you perform an attack against an enemy ship whose initiative is higher than yours, you may spend 1 {charge} to roll 1 additional attack die. After defending, lose 1 {charge}.

name: Blaze of Glory
description: After you are destroyed, before you are removed, you may perform an attack and drop or launch 1 device.

name: Rain of Fire
description: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may spend 2 {charge} to drop or launch a bomb using the (3 {s}) template.

name: Versatile
description: After you perform a {turret} or {missile} attack that misses, you may perform a bonus attack using a different weapon.

name: Last Stand
description: During the Engagement Phase, after a friendly small ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship has not engaged this phase, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, that ship engages at the current initiative.

name: Focused
description: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may perform a {focus} action.

name: Tactical Strike
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Take the Hit
description: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc and are not ionized, you may gain 1 ion token to cancel 1 {hit} result. If you do, gain 1 {xp}.

name: Instinctive Maneuvering
description: While you defend, if the attacker does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your blank or {focus} results to an {evade} result.

name: Point Blank Shot
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 0, treat it as an attack at attack range 1.

name: Long Range Scan
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, while friendly ships acquire locks this round, they must acquire locks beyond range 3 instead of at range 0-3.

name: Give Chase
description: When a friendly unit at range 0-2 performs a primary attack, if the attacker is in the defender's {arear}, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 additional die.

name: Cut and Run
description: After you defend, you may perform a red {boost} action, even while stressed.

name: Multi-tasking
description: After you gain a disarm token, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to remove 1 disarm token.

name: Ace Acrobatics
description: While you barrel roll, you must use the [{bl} or {br}] template instead of the [{s}] template.

name: Coordinated Action
description: After you a perform a {coordinate} action, if the ship you chose performed an action on your action bar, you may perform that action.

name: Disruptive Flight Path
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 performs an attack, if you are in the defender's {al} or {ar}, the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Undeterred
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform white actions, even while stressed. After you gain a stress token, you may perform a white action, if able.

name: Hard Target
description: After you perform an {evade} action, gain a calculate token

name: Coordinated Assault
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} to acquire a lock on the defender.

name: Wingmate
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends (after damage is resolved, if any), you may perform an action.

name: Dive In
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may acquire a lock on an enemy ship in your {ab}.

name: Slicer
description: During the End Phase, you may spend a lock you have on an enemy ship to expose 1 of that ship's damage cards.

name: Ordinance Expert
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a {torpedo} or {missile} attack, that ship may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

name: Drop and Roll
description: After you drop or launch a device, gain an evade token.

name: Take the Heat
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 or more friendly ships at range 0-3. If you do, transfer all enemy lock tokens from the chosen ships to you.

name: Trigger Finger
description: After you perform a primary attack that hits, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a bonus {cannon} attack.

name: Relentless
description: While you perform an attack against a locked ship, after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a lock on the defender.

name: Keep them in the Fight
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 with a lower initiative than yours partially executes a maneuver, it may perform a red {focus} action.

name: Glancing Blow
description: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if you are not stressed, you may suffer 1 {hit} damage and gain 1 stress token. If you do, cancel all dice results.

name: Hairpin Turn
description: While you would execute a {s} maneuver, you may increase the difficulty of the maneuver. If you do, execute it as a {k} maneuver instead.

name: Bombardier
description: After you drop or launch a device, you may perform an action.

name: Outlast
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends against a damaged attacker, the defender may reroll 1 defense die.

name: Phantom Killer
description: While you decloak, you must use the [2 {bl}] or [2 {br}] template instead of the [2 {s}] template.

name: Copycat
description: After an enemy ship at range 0-1 performs an action on its action bar, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform the same action, treating it as white.

name: Prey on the Weak
description: While you perform an attack against a damaged defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Hard to Kill
description: Before a friendly small ship at range 0-1 would suffer damage, you may spend 2 {charge}. If you do, prevent 1 damage. If you do, gain 1 {xp}.

name: Near Miss
description: Before a friendly small ship at range 0-1 would suffer 1 or more damage, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, prevent that damage. Gain 1 {xp} for each damage prevented this way. This cards {charge} may not be recovered.

name: Jingoist
description: Before you engage, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your {af} at range 0-1. If you do, that ship gains 1 deplete or strain token of your choice unless it chooses to remove 1 green token.

name: Pin them Down
description: While you perform an attack, after the defender rolls defense dice, you may spend 1 focus token to cancel all of the defender's blank/{focus} results.

name: Ordinance Specialist
description: While you perform a {torpedo} or {missile} attack, you may increase or decrease the range requirement by 1, to a limit of 0-3.

name: Critical Strike
description: While you perform a {torpedo} attack, if the defender is in your {ab}, change 1 {focus} result to a {crit} result.

name: Catch them Off Guard
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender does not have any green tokens, you may change 1 of your blank or {focus} results to a {hit} result.

name: Evasive Action
description: While you defend, if you are disarmed, roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Starbird's Folly
description: After you perform a {missile} attack, you may perform a bonus {cannon} attack. While you perform this bonus attack, you may change 1 {focus} result to a {hit} result.

name: Ruthless Commander
description: While an enemy ship at range 1-3 defends, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend 1 {charge} and choose a friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender. If you do, defense dice cannot be modified during this attack and the chosen friendly ship gains 1 strain token.

name: Shields Up
description: During the End Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to flip 1 of your reinforce tokens to your other full arc instead of removing it.

name: Alpha Strike
description: While you perform a primary attack, if you have 1 or fewer damage cards, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

name: In your Sights
description: After you execute a speed 3-4 maneuver, you may choose a ship in your {at} at range 0-1. That ship gains 1 strain token, or 2 strain tokens if you are damaged.

name: Fire in the Hole
description: After you drop a bomb, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {boost} action.

name: Wear them Down
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 {crit} result. If you do, deal 1 facedown damage card to the defender, then cancel your remaining results.

name: Ace Maneuvering
description: After you perform a {barrel} action, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {boost} action.

name: Sly Flourish
description: After you perform an attack that hits, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform an {evade} action.

name: Overdrive
description: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {slam} action.

name: Mark for Elimination
description: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} to acquire a lock on an enemy ship at range 0-1.

name: Nimble Assualt
description: After you perform an attack, you may perform a {barrel} or {boost} action, even if you are stressed.

name: Reflexive Maneuvering
description: While you execute a maneuver, you may execute a maneuver of the same bearing and difficulty of a speed 1 higher or lower instead.

name: Stay in Formation
description: While you perform a primary attack, if your squad leader is in your {al} or {ar} at range 0-1, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Counter Strike
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, if it was dealt a damage card, you may perform a bonus attack against the attacker.

name: Concentrated Fire
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs a primary attack, that ship may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Rash Maneuvering
description: After you perform an action, you may perform a red {boost} action.

name: Crippling Blow
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender would be dealt a faceup damage card, instead draw 3 damage cards, choose 1, and discard the rest.

name: Formation Flying
description: During the End Phase, you may choose up to 2 friendly small ships at range 0-2. You and the chosen ships may perform a red {barrel} or red {boost} action.

name: Point Blank
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 1, spend 2 {charge} to roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Maximum Firepower
description: While you perform an attack, if you are reinforced and the defender is in the {aff} or {afr} matching your reinforce token, you may change 1 of your {focus} results to a {crit} result.

name: Target Acquired
description: You can maintain up to 2 locks. After you perform an action, you may acquire a lock.

name: Pick them Apart
description: After you perform an attack that hits, if you are evading, expose 1 of the defender's damage cards.

name: Bullseye Shot
description: While you perform an attack against a defender in your {ab}, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Recoup
description: After you perform a {reload} action, you may recover 1 {charge} token on 1 of your equipped {talent} upgrade cards.

name: Precise Repositioning
description: After you perform a {barrel} action, you may spend 2 {charge}. If you do, gain a focus token.

name: No Risk No Reward
description: Action: Gain 1 strain token to recover 1 {charge}. Before you engage, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform an action.

name: Viper Strike
description: After you perform an attack that hits, gain 1 evade token.

name: Whispering Phantom
description: After you perform an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {cloak} action.

name: Survival Instinct
description: While you defend, if you are not shielded, you may change 1 of your blank results to a {focus} result.

name: Elusive Defender
description: While you defend, the attacker's dice cannot be modified.

name: All Too Easy
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your {ab}, gain 1 focus token.

name: Hit and Run
description: After you perform an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} and gain 1 deplete token to boost or barrel roll.

name: Tenuous Focus
description: While you are not damaged, treat your initiative value as 7.

name: Attack of Opportunity
description: After a ship at range 1-2 gains a red or orange token, if you do not have that ship locked, you may acquire a lock on that ship.

name: Blast 'em to Hell
description: While a friendly bomb or mine at range 0-2 detonates, each time attack dice are rolled to resolve its effect, you may reroll up to 1 of those dice.

name: Vendetta
description: While you are damaged, treat your initiative as 6.

name: Vitriolic Strike
description: While another friendly ship performs an attack, if you are at range 0-1 of the defender, you may suffer 1 {crit} damage to change 1 of the attacker's results to a {crit} result.

name: Prepare for Retribution
description: After another friendly ship is destroyed, you may perform an action, even while stressed.

name: You're Next
description: After you reload, each ship in your {ab} gains 1 deplete token.

name: Mounting Fury
description: After you suffer damage, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform an action.

name: Reckless Overdrive
description:
Adds: {slam}
After you perform a {slam} action, you must suffer 1 {hit} damage to remove 1 disarm token. Then, gain 1 deplete token.

name: Sniper
description: While you perform a primary attack at attack range 3, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Suicide Run
description: Before you engage, you may spend 2 {charge} to remove any number of jam tokens, and then gain 1 focus token for each enemy ship that has you in its {af}.

name: Ambush
description: While you perform a {at} primary attack, if the defender is in your {arear}, roll 1 additional die.

name: Overcharge
description: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not strained, you may gain 1 strain token to roll 1 additional die.

name: Death by a Thousand Cuts
description: While you perform an attack, if there is a damaged ship friendly to the defender at range 0-1 of the defender, the defender cannot spend focus or calculate tokens.

name: Aggressive Maneuvering
description: After you perform a {boost} action, you may spend 1 {charge} to remove 1 non-lock red or orange token.

name: Intimidating Slash
description: After you fully execute a maneuver or perform a {boost} action, each ship you moved through gains 2 jam tokens.

name: Go for the Kill
description: While you are stressed, you may treat enemy ships in your {af} at range 0-1 as being in your {ab}.

name: Reckless Assualt
description: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress and 1 strain token to roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Devastating Shot
description: While you perform a primary attack, you may spend your lock on the defender and a focus token to change all of your results to {crit} results.

name: Sneak Attack
description: While you perform an attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, the defender rolls 2 fewer defense dice.

name: No Escape
description: After you fully execute a maneuver or perform a {boost} action, if you moved through an enemy ship, you may acquire a lock on that ship.

name: Zeal
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 {charge} and gain 1 stress token. If you do, until the end of the round, while you defend or perform an attack, you may change all of your {focus} results to {evade} or {hit} results.

name: They're Mine
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend another friendly ship's lock on the defender to reroll any number of your results.

name: Fury
description: After you perform a {ab} attack, if you have 1 or more non-lock red or orange tokens, you may perform a bonus attack against a different target.

name: Jaws of Death
description: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your {ab}. That ship gains 1 deplete or strain token of your choice.

name: Hacklock
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have a lock on the enemy ship, that ship's dice cannot be modified.

name: Quickdraw
description: After you lose a shield, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, you may perform a bonus primary attack.

name: Ease the Pressure
description: After a friendly small ship in your {at} gains a deplete or strain token, if you have no tokens of that type, you may transfer that token to yourself.

name: Kill Shot
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender has 2 or fewer hull remaining, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, gain 1 deplete token after rolling attack dice.

name: Watch your Six
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your {arear}, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Pile On
description: After a friendly ship at range 1-2 performs an attack against an enemy ship in your {af}, you may perform a {focus} action.

name: Lending Assistance
description: After you defend or perform an attack, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-2 in your {al} or {ar}. If you do, transfer 1 green token to that ship.

name: Leap into Action
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is a friendly ship at range 0-1 whose revealed maneuver is blue, you may perform a {boost} action.

name: Broadside
description: While you perform a {at} attack, if your {at} indicator is in your {al} or {ar}, you may change 1 blank result to a {focus} result.

name: Toe-to-toe
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the speed of your revealed maneuver is the same as the enemy ship's, that ship's dice cannot be modified.

name: Coordinated Assault
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 performs an attack, if you have exactly 1 non-lock red token or exactly 1 orange token, that ship may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Quick Thinking
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the speed of your revealed maneuver is greater than the enemy ship's, you may reroll your blank results.

name: Payback
description: After a friendly ship in your {al} or {ar} defends, you may acquire a lock on the attacker.

name: I've got your Back
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, if you are not strained, you may allow it to spend your focus and evade tokens as if that ship has them. If it does, you gain 1 strain token.

name: Formation Fire
description: While a friendly ship at range 1-2 in your {al} or {ar} performs a primary attack, it may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Throttle
description: While you defend, if the speed of your revealed maneuver is even, roll 1 additional defende die. While you perform a primary attack, if the speed of your revealed maneuver is odd, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Swoop In
description: After a friendly small or medium ship fully executes a speed 3-4 maneuver, if it is at range 0-1, it may perform a red {boost} action.

name: Last Ditch Effort
description: After you or a friendly non-limited ship at range 0-2 are destroyed during the Engagement Phase, that ship is not removed until the end of that phase.

name: Focus Fire
description: During the System Phase, you may choose an object that you have locked at range 1-3. Another friendly ship at range 1-3 may acquire a lock on that object.

name: Bring them Down
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 deplete token to choose an object in your {af} at range 1-2. If you do, another friendly ship may perform a {lock} action to lock that object.

name: Attack Pattern Alpha
description: At the start of the end phase, each friendly ship at range 0-1 that has a revealed maneuver of speed 3-5 may gain 1 strain token to perform a {barrel} or {boost} action.

name: Death Roll
description: After you perform a {barrel} action, you may perform a red {lock} action.

name: Lock them Down
description: While a ship that you have locked at range 1-3 defends or performs an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} to prevent range bonuses from being applied.

name: Courage Under Fire
description: While you perform a primary or {at} attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each red token you have.

name: Forward Focused
description: While an enemy ship in your {af} defends or performs an attack, that ship can modify only 1 {focus} result (other results can still be modified).

name: Sideslip
description: When you reveal a [2 {bl}] or [2 {br}] maneuver, you may spend 2 {charge} to execute it as a sideslip.

name: Both Guns Blazing
description: While you perform a primary {af} attack, you may spend 1 {charge} to reroll 1 attack die. While you perform a primary {arear} attack, you may recover 1 {charge} to roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Match Up
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the bearing of your revealed maneuver is the same as the enemy ship's, you may change 1 of the enemy ship's {focus} results to a blank result.

name: Fight On
description: After you are destroyed, you may choose a friendly non-limited ship and assign 1 of your equipped {talent} upgrades to it. End of Game: Return all {talent} upgrades to their original ships.

name: Pounce
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, if there is an enemy ship in your {ab}, you, or a friendly ship at range 0-3 may acquire a lock on that ship.

name: Ground Zero
description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is at range 0-1 of at least 1 friendly device, roll 1 additional die.

name: Take the Initiative
description: Before you engage, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc at range 0-1. If you do, transfer 1 green token from that ship to yourself.

name: Flight Pattern
description: After you fully execute a blue maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, that ship removes 1 stress token.

name: Bait
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 performs a primary attack, if you are in the defender's {ab}, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

name: Damage Control
description: Before you expose 1 of your damage cards, you may look at your facedown damage cards, choose 1, and expose that card instead.

name: Compromising Intel
description:
Setup: After placing forces, assign the Compromising Intel condition to 1 enemy ship in play or on the mission chart.
This ship may not spend focus tokens when attacking you or defending from your attacks.

name: Steady
description: After you execute a red basic maneuver or perform a red action, if you have exactly 1 stress token, you may gain 1 strain token to remove that stress token.

name: Bold Moves
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through a friendly ship, you may perform an {evade} action.

name: Casino
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may add 1 blank result, or you may gain 1 strain token to add 1 focus result instead.

name: Take them Down
description: After a ship at range 1-2 is dealt a damage card, you may acquire a lock on that ship.

name: Headhunter
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender's initiative is higher than yours, you may change 1 blank result to a {focus} result.

name: Coordinated Effort
description: After you coordinate or are coordinated, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may perform 1 action on your action bar as a red action, even if you are stressed.

name: Spot Me
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is in another friendly ship's {at}, you may spend 1 focus token from that friendly ship to change 1 of your {focus} results to an {evade} or {hit} result.

name: Evasive Sighting
description: While you defend, if the attacker is in a friendly ship's {at}, you may add 1 {focus} result to your roll.

name: Unpredictable
description: During the System Phase, you may perform a red {barrel} or {boost} action.

name: Shockwave
description:
After you perform an attack, if the defender is in your {at}, assign the Rattled condition to the defender.
During its select action step, the Rattled ship will skip its action to remove the condition if there are no bombs or mines at range 0-1.

name: Daring Bomb Run
description: After you fully execute a blue or white maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may drop 1 device.

name: Stronger Together
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} or 1 non-recurring {charge} from your equipped {astromech} upgrade to reroll up to 1 of your dice for each other friendly ship at range 0-1.

name: Reflexive Defense
description: After you lose 1 shield, gain 1 evade token.

name: Strength in Numbers
description: While you perform a primary or {turret} attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each friendly device or calculating friendly ship in the attack arc.

name: Unflinching
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may execute red maneuvers even while stressed.

name: Bring up the Rear
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll up to 1 of your results for each other friendly ship in the attack arc.

name: Follow my Lead
description: After you defend, you may choose a friendly ship in your {afr} at range 0-2 and 1 of your green tokens. If you do, that ship gains a matching token.

name: Swerve
description: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 strain token to rotate 90° or 180°.

name: Crowd Control
description: You do not skip your Perform Action step after you partially execute a maneuver.

name: Damaged Defenses
description: While you defend, if the attacker is damaged, you may reroll 1 defense die.

name: Band of Brothers
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, before that ship is removed, you may perform an action. Then you may perform a bonus attack.

name: Seeing Red
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if your revealed maneuver is red, roll 1 additional die.

name: Precision Bomber
description: Before you would drop a bomb, you may place it in the play area touching you instead.

name: Time on Target
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may rotate your {at}.

name: Born to Fly
description: While you boost, you may use the [1 {sl}] or [1 {sr}] template instead.

name: Confidence
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the enemy ship's initiative is higher than the number of damage cards you have, you may roll 1 additional die.

name: Attack Speed
description: After you fully execute a speed 2-4 maneuver, you may perform a {boost} action.

name: Attack Run
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, each friendly T-70 X-wing at range 0-3 may gain 1 strain token to flip its equipped {configuration} upgrade. If it does, that ship gains 1 calculate token.

name: Wing Formation
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 performs an attack, if the defender has a ship friendly to the attacker in each of its side arcs ({al} and {ar}), the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Surprise
description: While you perform a {torpedo} or {missile} attack, you may treat the {af} requirement as {arear} for that attack. If you do, treat the range requirement as 1-2.

name: Called Shot
description: After you perform an attack, if the defender was dealt a faceup damage card, the defender gains 1 strain token unless it chooses 1 non-recurring {charge} from 1 of its equipped upgrades and loses that {charge}.

name: Throw them Off
description: After you defend at attack range 1, if the attacker modified its dice, the attacker gains 1 deplete token.

name: Tallon Roll Expert
description: After you reveal a red Tallon Roll [{trolll} or {trollr}] maneuver, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, treat that maneuver as white.

name: Desperate Measures
description: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, if you are damaged, you can execute red basic maneuvers even while stressed; if you are critically damaged, you can execute red advanced maneuvers even while stressed.

name: Press the Attack
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if you are stressed, you must roll 1 fewer defense die or 1 additional attack die.

name: Coming in Hot
description: After you gain a stress token, if there is an enemy ship in your {af} at range 0-1, you may remove that stress token.

name: Bombs Away!
description: After you drop a device, you may spend 1 {charge} to drop an additional device.

name: I Got You
description: After you perform a {boost} action, you may transfer 1 evade token to a friendly ship at range 1.

name: Backup
description: While an enemy ship in your {ab} performs an attack, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional die.

name: Hard to Pin Down
description: After you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} to gain 1 focus or evade token.

name: In Sync
description: After a ship at range 1 performs an action during its Perform Action step, if that action is on your action bar, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform that action, treating it as red.

name: Infiltrator
description: Setup: You can be placed anywhere in the play area beyond range 3 of enemy ships.

name: Pushing the Limit
description: After you perform an action, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a white action, treating it as red.

name: Master Tactician
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 performs an action during its activation, you may spend 2 {charge}. If you do, that ship may perform a white action, treating it as red.

name: Don't Tread on Me
description: After you defend, each other ship at range 0 suffers 1 {crit} damage.

name: Con Artist
description: Action: Choose 2 non-huge ships at range 0-3 of you that are not friendly to each other. Each chosen ship may perform an action that is on your action bar, even while stressed, in the order of your choice. Then, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Fight Fire with Fire
description: After you become the defender, if the attacker is not in your {at}, you must rotate your {at} indicator to a standard arc the attacker is in.

name: Duelist
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your {af}. If you do, treat your initiative as equal to that ship's until the end of the round.

name: Scrappy
description: While you defend or perform an attack, after you roll or reroll your dice, if you have the same result on each of your dice, you may add 1 matching result.

name: Hell Bent
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may suffer 1 {hit} damage to reroll any number of your dice.

name: Escape Vector
description: If you are not shielded, decrease the difficulty of your bank ({bl} and {br}) maneuvers.

name: Oversight
description: Before a friendly ship at range 1 would gain a disarm token, if that ship is not stressed, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, that ship gains 1 stress token instead.

name: Full Throttle
description: While you defend, you may treat your agility value as equal to the speed of the maneuver you executed this round.

name: Menacing
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in your firing arc. If you do, that ship engages at initiative 0 instead of its normal initiative value this round.

name: Scraping Paint
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there are one or more other ships at range 0, you and each other ship at range 0 gain 1 tractor token.

name: Precise
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, gain 1 calculate token. At the start of the End Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0-1. If you do, transfer 1 of your stress tokens to that ship.

name: Nimble
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is a larger size than you, roll 1 additional die.

name: Opportunist
description: After an enemy ship suffers damage, if it is not defending, you may perform a bonus attack against that ship.

name: Harass
description: While you defend or perform an attack, before attack dice are rolled, if you are not in the enemy ship's {ab}, you may spend 2 {charge}. If you do, the enemy ship gains 1 jam token.

name: Power Drain
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 shielded ship in your {ab} and spend 1 {charge}. If you do, that ship loses 1 shield and you recover 1 shield.

name: Intimidating Shot
description: Before you engage, you may spend 1 green token and 1 {charge}. If you do, you may choose another ship at range 0-1 that is not stressed. The chosen ship gains 1 stress token.

name: Cunning
description: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend 2 {charge} to choose yourself or a ship in your {at} with 1 or more circular tokens. During the End Phase, circular tokens are not removed from that ship.

name: Need an Assist
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 0-2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

name: Exploiter
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is stressed, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

name: Swivel Mounted Weaponry
description: You can perform {af} special attacks from your {arear}. While you perform a special attack, you may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Uncanny Evasion
description: After you defend or perform an attack, if the attack missed, gain 1 evade token.

name: Outfox
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the enemy ship is stressed, that ship's dice cannot be modified.

name: Incite Panic
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a ship at range 1 and spend a lock you have on that ship. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

name: Repurposed Calculations
description: At the end of the Engagement Phase, you may spend a calculate token and 1 {charge} to acquire a lock on an enemy ship at range 2-3.

name: On My Mark
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1. If you do, transfer all green tokens assigned to you to that ship.

name: Audacious Assault
description: Friendly ships at range 0-1 can perform attacks at range 0 of obstacles.

name: Maximum Impact
description: After a friendly device that you have locked detonates, each enemy ship at range 0-1 of that device gains 1 strain token.

name: Eye for an Eye
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your firing arc at range 0-2. If you do, transfer 1 focus or evade token from that ship to yourself.

name: Patient Hunter
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 {charge} on 1 of your equipped upgrades.

name: Precise Shot
description: Before you engage, you may gain 1 strain token. While you perform a primary attack, if you are strained, you may change 1 of your blank or {focus} results to a {hit} result.

name: Zero In
description: While you defend, if the attacker is in your {at} at range 0-2, you may add 1 {focus} result to your dice results.

name: Bomb Expert
description: If you would drop a device using a [1 {s}] template, you may drop it using any other speed 1 template instead.

name: War Cry
description: After you perform an attack, if the defender was destroyed, you may perform an action, even while stressed. Then you may gain 2 strain tokens to perform a bonus attack.

name: Barrage
description: While you perform a primary attack, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

name: Retribution
description: While you perform a {af} attack, if you are damaged, you may change 1 of your {focus} results to a {crit} result. While you defend, if you are damaged, before the Modify Defense Dice step, you must change 1 of your {focus} results to a blank result.

name: Hard Hitter
description: While you perform a primary attack, after the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 {crit} result to add 2 {hit} results.

name: Devastating Blow
description: After you perform an attack that hits, you may spend 2 {charge} to transfer 1 of your non-lock red or orange tokens to the defender.

name: Bomb Hurler
description: If you would drop a device, you may launch it using a [1 {s}] template instead.

name: Ionization Expert
description: After an enemy ship at range 0-3 receives at least 1 ion token, you may spend 3 {charge}. If you do, that ship gains 2 additional ion tokens.

name: Breakaway Turn
description: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 stress token to rotate your ship 90°.

name: Master Commander
description: While a friendly ship performs an attack, if the defender is in your firing arc, the attacker may reroll 1 attack die.

name: Special Delivery
description: If you would drop a device using a [1 {s}] template, you may use the [3 {sl}], [3 {s}], or [3 {sr}] template instead.

name: Applying Pressure
description: Before you engage, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your {ab} at range 1-2 and gain 1 disarm token. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

name: Gain the Upper Hand
description: After you acquire a lock, you must remove all of your focus and evade tokens. Then, gain the same number of focus and evade tokens that the locked ship has.

name: Hot Pursuit
description: While you defend, if you are behind the attacker, roll 1 additional defense die. While you perform an attack, if you are behind the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Coordinated Circutry
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship with {calculate} on its action bar at range 1-3. If you do, transfer 1 of your calculate tokens to it.

name: Follow Through
description: After you perform an attack that misses, you may perform a bonus {cannon} attack.

name: Need for Speed
description: After you perform a {boost} action, you may perform an {evade} action.

name: Deft Maneuvering
description: While you execute a Segnor's Loop ({sloopl} or {sloopr}) maneuver, you may use another template of the same speed instead: either the turn ({sl} or {sr}) of the same direction or the straight ({s}) template.

name: Both Barrels
description: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 {charge} from an equipped {torpedo} upgrade. If you do, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

name: Hot Shot
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, gain 2 focus tokens.

name: The Mynock Mulligan
description: After you roll dice, if you are not stressed, you may gain 1 stress token to reroll all of your blank results.

name: I'll Be Back
description: If you would flee, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, place yourself in reserves instead. At the start of the next Planning Phase, place yourself within range 1 of the edge of the play area that you fled from.

name: Assassin
description: While you perform a primary attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Into the Fray
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at range 0-1.

name: Remote Detonation
description: Before a friendly bomb or mine would detonate, you may spend 1 {charge} to prevent it from detonating. While you defend against an attack obstructed by a bomb or mine, roll 1 additional defense die.

name: Tank the Hit
description: While you defend, after the Neutralize Results step, if there are more {hit}/{crit} results than your active {shield}, you may change 1 {hit} result to a {crit} and cancel 1 {hit} result.

name: Dance of Death
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is at least 1 enemy ship at range 0-1, you may gain 1 focus token.

name: Blindside
description: While you perform a non-{af} attack, roll 1 additional attack die.

name: Tractor Beam
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 ship in both your {af} and {at} at range 0-1. If you do, that ship gains 1 tractor token.

name: Outflank
description: Before you engage, if you are not in any enemy ship's {af}, you may acquire a lock on an enemy ship in your full front arc.

name: Jink
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1. If you do and you are in its {af}, it removes all of its green tokens.

name: Advanced Maneuvers
description: After you fully execute an advanced maneuver, you may perform a {calculate} or {barrel} action, even while stressed. If you do, gain 1 strain token.

name: Coordinated Defense
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, it may reroll 1 of its dice.

name: Strike Hared and Fade Away
description: While you defend at attack range 3 or perform an attack at attack range 1, roll 1 additional die.

name: Bring It
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if you are in the {af} at range 1-2 of 2 or more enemy ships, you may change 1 of your blank results to a {focus} result.

name: Showdown
description: After you defend, if the attacker is in your {af}, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a bonus attack against the attacker.

name: Up Close and Personal
description: While you defend or perform an attack, if the attack range is 1, you may roll 1 additional die.

name: Unexpected Shot
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, you may roll 1 additional die.

name: Do the Math
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your calculate tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-3.

name: Pursuit Scanners
description: After you perform an attack, if the defender is in your {af}, you may acquire a lock on it. Then, if the defender is in your {ab}, it gains 1 strain token.

name: Pinpoint Strike
description: After you perform an attack that missed, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your {ab} and gain 1 deplete token. If you do, that ship suffers 1 {hit} damage.

name: Pinpoint Calculations
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs a primary attack, if the defender is in its {ab}, before the Neutralize Results step, the friendly ship may spend 1 calculate token to cancel 1 {evade} result.

name: Calculated Response
description: After you defend, you may spend 1 calculate token to perform an action.

name: Combat Analysis
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 calculate token to perform a {coordinate} action. You cannot coordinate ships that do not have the Networked Calculations ship ability.

name: Sensor Jammer
description: After you perform a {calculate} action, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform a {jam} action.

name: Defensive Protocols
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, it may spend 1 calculate token to change all {crit} results to {hit} results.

name: Networked Aim
description: Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship transfers 1 calculate token to you.

name: Networked Targetting System
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may acquire a lock on an object at range 1-3 that has a friendly lock.

name: Synced Calculations
description: While you perform a primary attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each calculating friendly ship at range 1 of the defender.

name: Overcharged
description: While you perform an attack at range 1, you must roll 1 additional die. After the attack hits, suffer 1 {crit} damage.

name: Shared Network
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship in the enemy ship's firing arc to change 1 {focus} result to an {evade} or {hit} result.

name: Burst into Action
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll any number of your dice. Then if you were defending, gain 1 strain token for each die that was rerolled. If you were attacking, gain 1 deplete token for each die that was rerolled instead.

name: Backstabber
description: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not in the defender's firing arc, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

name: Automated Repair Protocols
description: At the start of the System Phase, you may repair 1 faceup damage card.

name: Advanced Intelligence
description: While you defend, if the attacker's initiative is equal to or greater than yours, you may change 1 blank result to a {focus} result.

name: Predatory Programming
description: After you perform an attack that hits, each friendly ship with {calculate} on its action bar and a lock on the defender may perform a red {calculate} action.

name: Stalking Prey
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the difficulty of your revealed maneuver is less than that of the enemy ship's, you may change 1 of the enemy ship's {focus} results to a blank result.

name: Shake it Off
description: During the System Phase, you may gain 1 disarm token and choose a critically damaged friendly ship at range 1-2. If you do, it gains 1 tractor token, then repairs 1 of its faceup Ship trait damage cards. If you do, gain 1 {xp}.

name: Lone Operative
description: While you defend, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, you may change 1 of your blank results to a {focus} result.

name: Something to Prove
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender's initiative is equal to or greater than yours, you may spend 2 {charge} to roll 1 additional die.

name: Lookout
description: Before a friendly ship at range 0-2 activates, you may spend 1 {charge}. If you do, that ship may gain 1 strain token to remove 1 non-stress red or orange token.

name: Double Down
description: During the Engagement Phase, after another ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, you may spend 1 {charge} to perform an action, even while stressed.

name: Seize the Advantage
description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is tractored, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.
